Title: Senshi
Director: Tetsuro Araki, Masashi Koizuka, Hiroyuki Tanaka
Actors: Yuki Kaji, Yui Ishikawa, Marina Inoue, Yoshimasa Hosoya
Plot: Following the battle, the Scouts regroup atop the wall only to find more questions than answers. Before they leave for Trost to get medical attention, Reiner must fulfill what he came to do.
